<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Check if the attachment dropdown exists and capture the state of it if exists</description>
        <name>Attachment dropdown property capture</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    gs.info(gs.getMessage('Attachment property capture: Executing the attachment property capture script'));
    if (pm.isZboot()) {
        gs.info(gs.getMessage('Attachment property capture: returning since its zboot'));
        return;
    }
    var PROP_NAME = "com.glide.encryption.enable_attachment_key_ui";
    var PROP_STATE = PROP_NAME + ".state";
    if (gs.getProperty(PROP_NAME, false) == 'false') {
        gs.info(gs.getMessage('Attachment property capture: Property before is false or does not exists, hence returning'));
        return;
    }
    gs.setProperty(PROP_STATE, true);
    gs.info(gs.getMessage('Attachment property capture: Created state property'));
})();]]></script>
